name: Breakfast Time !
description:
You just woke up damn hungry this morning ! The only thing that could get you good is a big ol' breakfast with eggs, bacon and a jug of rad-milk.  You don't have any but nevermind, you have your guns to take it from those pesky farmyard animals.

Shoot your way through the farm in order to get all the ingredients and get back to your barbecue once you've gathered enough. You can also use those ingredients to open the doors and access new areas with more enemies. Once you make yourself a breakfast, you will regenerate your whole life and get an additional gun to rampage across the fields and get as many kills as possible. 

Do not hesitate to tell us what you think about the game and leave a comment to share your score !

Enjoy your meal !

(This game was initially made for a 48 hours game jam before being polished and balanced)

A game by Margaux Mongin, Eloi Grivot-Brunhes, Ged Loewenguth, Hugo Demortier, Alan Kilby, Charles Martinelli.
